recipe.ingredients: - carrots (grated): 4 medium - fresh parsley (chopped): 1/4 cup - fresh dill (chopped): 2 tablespoons - lemon zest: 1 teaspoon - lemon juice: 3 tablespoons - olive oil: 2 tablespoons - garlic (minced): 1 clove - black pepper: 1/4 teaspoon
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Carrots: Peel and grate the carrots. Place them in a large mixing bowl. 2. Add Herbs: To the grated carrots, add chopped parsley and dill. 3. Make Dressing: In a small bowl, combine lemon zest, lemon juice, olive oil, minced garlic, and black pepper. Whisk together until well mixed. 4. Toss and Chill: Pour the dressing over the carrot and herb mixture and toss until the carrots are evenly coated. Refrigerate the salad for at least 20 minutes to let the flavors blend. 5. Serve: Serve chilled as a refreshing and flavorful side dish or appetizer.
